column1: Step into a distant future where bounty hunters roam the solar system. Spike and Jet, partners in the bounty hunting business, embark on adventures in their constant struggle to earn rewards and make a living. Along the way, they encounter some intriguing characters—Faye, a stunning but hopelessly broke gambler, Edward, a genius hacker, and Ein, a genetically enhanced dog. Could these unique individuals become valuable additions to their team?

Naruto Uzumaki, an energetic and mischievous ninja, lives in Konohagakure, the Hidden Leaf Village. Just before his birth, the village was attacked by a powerful demon known as the Nine-Tailed Fox, or Kyuubi, causing widespread destruction. To stop the devastation, the village's leader, the Fourth Hokage, gave his life to seal the Kyuubi within the newborn Naruto. Because of this, Naruto is shunned by the villagers and struggles to find his place. Determined to earn their respect, he dreams of becoming Hokage, meeting both allies and enemies on his journey. Source: MAL Rewrite.

Gold Roger was known as the Pirate King the strongest and most infamous being to have sailed the Grand Line The capture and death of Roger by the World Government brought a change throughout the world His last words before his death revealed the location of the greatest treasure in the world One Piece It was this revelation that brought about the Grand Age of Pirates men who dreamed of finding One Piece which promises an unlimited amount of riches and fame and quite possibly the most coveted of titles for the person who found it the title of the Pirate King Enter Monkey D Luffy a 17 year old boy that defies your standard definition of a pirate Rather than the popular persona of a wicked hardened toothless pirate who ransacks villages for fun Luffy’s reason for being a pirate is one of pure wonder the thought of an exciting adventure and meeting new and intriguing people along with finding One Piece are his reasons of becoming a pirate Following in the footsteps of his childhood hero Luffy and his crew travel across the Grand Line experiencing crazy adventures unveiling dark mysteries and battling strong enemies all in order to reach One Piece *This includes following special episodes Chopperman to the Rescue Protect the TV Station by the Shore Episode 336 The Strongest Tag Team Luffy and Toriko's Hard Struggle Episode 492 Team Formation Save Chopper Episode 542 History's Strongest Collaboration vs Glutton of the Sea Episode 590 20th Anniversary Special Romance Dawn Episode 907

In the year 2015 the Angels huge tremendously powerful alien war machines appear in Tokyo for the second time The only hope for Mankind's survival lies in the Evangelion a humanoid fighting machine developed by NERV a special United Nations agency Capable of withstanding anything the Angels can dish out the Evangelion's one drawback lies in the limited number of people able to pilot them Only a handful of teenagers all born fourteen years ago nine months after the Angels first appeared are able to interface with the Evangelion One such teenager is Shinji Ikari whose father heads the NERV team that developed and maintains the Evangelion Thrust into a maelstrom of battle and events that he does not understand Shinji is forced to plumb the depths of his own inner resources for the courage and strength to not only fight but to survive or risk losing everything Source AniDB Note Later releases include edited versions of Episodes 21 24 called the Director's Cut with some visual editing and adding extra scenes that appeared in the theatrical recap 'Death'
